summary: WHILE DRIVING UNDER NORMAL CONDITIONS TRANSMISSION WILL SUDDENLY AND RANDOMLY LOCK IN 3RD OR 5TH GEAR AND WILL NOT DOWN OR UP SHIFT. DIFFICULT TO GET MOVING FROM A COMPLETE STOP FROM 5TH GEAR. SPEEDO DOES NOT WORK WHEN THIS EVENT OCCURS SOMETIMES ABLE TO STOP, PLACE TRANSMISSION IN PARK AND RESTART TO RESET THE SYSTEM FOR A SHORT PERIOD. THIS DOES NOT ALWAYS WORK THOUGH. WRENCH ICON ILLUMINATES ON THE INFO CENTER, SPEEDO AND TRIP METERS SHOW BLANK LINES AS WELL. I HAVE PICS AND A VIDEO CLIP BUT UNABLE TO SHARE AT THE MOMENT.
